price: 18. And say to him: "Would you purify yourself (from the sin of disbelief by becoming a believer)?"
arabic: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: faqul hal laka ilā an tazakkā
